title: Strengthening Customer Service Competencies: Multimedia Project Management Strategies Based on Practical Case Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Analyze and present budget-time-quality trade-offs in real multimedia projects using mathematical models
Apply a five-stage project management process derived from case studies to actual team projects
Explain methods for measuring progress by combining Agile sprint planning with mathematical evaluation metrics
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
